channel.title: SoftPortal.com: newest software
channel.description: List of new software at Softportal.com

item.title: AllDup 4.5.58
item.description: AllDup is a free tool to find and remove duplicate files on your computer

item.title: Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Package 2010
item.description: Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Package - a package that installs the Visual C++ library runtime components required to run applications developed with Visual C++ on a computer without the Visual C++ 2010 environment installed

item.title: Android Studio 2023.1.1.26
item.description: Android Studio - a complete platform for developing and testing applications for the Android operating system

item.title: RegScanner 2.71
item.description: RegScanner is a small free utility that scans the registry according to specified search criteria and then, displays a list of found registry values

item.title: USB Image Tool 1.90
item.description: An easy-to-use portable program that allows you to easily create and restore USB drive backups. The utility works with IMG and IMA formats and allows you to manage images depending on the profiles used by the user

item.title: Ashampoo Burning Studio Free 24.0.45
item.description: Ashampoo Burning Studio Free is a free application for working with CD/DVD/Blu-Ray disks, with which you can easily burn audio and video of various formats to optical media. There is a built-in CD Ripper, the ability to create images

item.title: PeaZip 9.5.0
item.description: PeaZip is a free archiver that supports the most common archive formats: 7Z, ACE, ARC/WRC, ARJ, BZ/TBZ, CAB, CHM/CHZ/HXS, CPIO, 7Z-sfx, BZ2/TBZ2, GZ/TGZ, PAQ/LPAQ, QUAD, TAR, UPX, ZIP and many others

item.title: Acronis True Image WD Edition 24.0.28080
item.description: A free tool that allows you to easily clone disks and backup your entire system, installed applications, settings and all user data. Works with local HDD/SSD disks, network drives, and removable devices

item.title: Mouse Jiggler 2.0.25
item.description: A free and easy-to-use tool that can simulate mouse movements so that you can avoid, for example, the screensaver appearing too often and hibernation being turned on or off. The program does not require installation

item.title: SP Flash Tool 5.1924
item.description: A useful program for flashing MTK-based phones and tablets. The key feature of the application that sets it apart from its competitors is support for all MediaTek processors, which allows you to reflash or repair absolutely any Android device

item.title: SSD Tweaker 4.0.1
item.description: SSD Tweaker is a small, free utility that allows you to quickly configure your operating system for optimal interaction with SSD drives

item.title: USB Low-Level Format 5.01
item.description: A free program for low-level formatting of USB disks. The application allows you to delete all data from the disk, including settings and contents, and then add zero bytes to every location on the disk, thus returning the performance to the factory state

item.title: FL Studio (FruityLoops) 21.1.1.3750
item.description: FL Studio (FruityLoops) - A well-proven program that has a synthesizer, drum machine, samples, and everything else a musician needs to create his own works

item.title: Ontrack EasyRecovery Pro 16.0.0.2
item.description: Ontrack EasyRecovery Pro - Allows you to easily recover data on your hard drive as in the simplest cases - after deleting them from the recycle garbage can, and lost due to a mistaken disk formatting or virus attack

item.title: ATITool 0.26
item.description: ATITool is an application for the automatic overclocking of ATI and NVIDIA graphics cards, including monitoring, overclocking, and general and fine-tuning control. There is no overclocking frequency limit, and temperature control, and fan control

item.title: Windows Repair 4.14.0
item.description: Windows Repair is a tool to repair various Windows settings with which user can fix most of the known issues like registry errors, file permissions, native firewall, and IE browser issues

item.title: Cutting 3 1.50
item.description: Cutting 3 - program for optimal cutting of material into rectangular or linear parts

item.title: Passmark MonitorTest 4.0 Build 1001
item.description: Passmark MonitorTest - The program is a test to evaluate the quality of CRT, LCD, and plasma monitors.

item.title: Duplicate Cleaner 5.20.0.1
item.description: Duplicate Cleaner is a free program to find and remove duplicates of all types of files: photos, music, videos, Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, text files, and others

item.title: Jagannatha Hora 8.0
item.description: Jagannatha Hora is one of the most popular programs for Vedic astrologers. The program is intended not only for those who are seriously engaged in Vedic astrology but also for those who are just beginning to study it
